member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.IDistribution.Mean
member.summary: Gets the mean of the distribution.

member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.IDistribution.Variance
member.summary: Gets the variance of the distribution.

member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.IDistribution.StdDev
member.summary: Gets the standard deviation of the distribution.

member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.IDistribution.Median
member.summary: Gets the median of the distribution.

member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.ICountiniousDistribusion.Mode

member.name: P:Statistics.Distributions.ICountiniousDistribusion.Maximum
